import logo from './logo.svg'; import './App.css'; var current_guess = 1; function App() { document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { var all_keys = document.getElementsByClassName('key'); for (let i = 0; i < all_keys.length; i++) { let curr_key = all_keys[i]; curr_key.addEventListener('click', () => type_letter(curr_key)) } function type_letter(letter) { var guess_row = document.getElementsByClassName("guess" + toString(current_guess)); var grid_items = guess_row.getElementsByClassName("grid-item"); console.log(grid_items); } }); return (
